summary: REQ-2 (brand name dark brown) is implemented in Header. REQ-1 logic for falling back to a default logo when localStorage has no custom logo is implemented via DEFAULT_LOGO_URL/effectiveLogoUrl, but the required static image asset file is not present in the diff (no added files).

hallucinated_features.description: Image load error handling that clears a custom uploaded logo from localStorage and falls back to the default logo.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks to set a default logo and change brand name color, while preserving existing upload + persistence behavior; adding logic to remove the stored logo on image error is additional behavior not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state updates (adding AR entries / changing project_state.json) and updating frontend-file-summaries.txt.
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are not part of the branding requirements (logo default + brand text color) and are not requested deliverables.
